data.actual_result: You see as many numbers of bars as the number of people changed in the online/offline list.
data.expected_result: You should see only one online bar.
data.short_description: The online bar in a big server is relplicated as many times as the membercount under the online bar dec/inc(ie when people go offline/online) .
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a big server that has many people go online/offline in a short amount of time very often. - Scroll down extremely fast ( don't let the grey placeholders load) till you reach the start of online members list.
